meanings.sent1: The skaters glided gracefully on the ice.
meanings.sent2: We watched the skaters perform amazing tricks at the rink.
meanings.sent3: The skaters raced each other to see who could reach the finish line first.
meanings.sent4: The skaters moved as smoothly as swans on the frozen pond.
meanings.sent5: The young skaters giggled with joy as they practiced their moves.

meanings.definition: Those who engage in the sport of skating.
meanings.sent1: The skaters practiced diligently to improve their skills.
meanings.sent2: Many skaters gathered at the park for a friendly competition.
meanings.sent3: The skaters cheered loudly for their teammates during the match.
meanings.sent4: The skaters glided across the ice like a team of synchronized dancers.
meanings.sent5: The dedicated skaters woke up early every morning to train for the upcoming competition.
